original_text: And take double money in your hand; and the money that was brought again in the mouth of your sacks, carry it again in your hand; peradventure it was an oversight:
korean_text: 너희 손에 갑절의 돈을 가지고 너희 자루 아귀에 도로 넣어져 있던 그 돈을 다시 가지고 가라 혹 잘못이 있었을까 두렵도다

sentences.original_text: And take double money in your hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네 손에 돈을 갑절로 가져가라

sentences.original_text: and the money that was brought again
in the mouth of your sacks
carry it again in your hand
